front.title: IEEE Standard for Automatic Test Markup Language (ATML) for Exchanging Automatic Test Information via eXtensible Markup Language (XML): Exchanging Test Configuration Information

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document specifies an exchange format, utilizing XML, for identifying the test configuration used to test and diagnose a unit under test (UUT) on an automatic test system (ATS).
